fields.name: Healing Wind (Cost ?%x2/?%):
fields.value: Target a player, potentially including yourself, and choose an amount. Their Defense Score for the Night will be increased by the amount you chose. This ability costs either 2x or 1x the amount that Defense Score is increased, depending on # of living Mages.

fields.name: Vortex (Cost 55%/30%):
fields.value: Target a player. You will attack one player who visits them tonight, prioritizing attacks over non-attacks. If you kill an attacker, their attack will not hit the target. Players directly aligned with you cannot be targeted by this attack.

fields.name: Agility Boost (Cost 50%/25%):
fields.value: Target a player. Any abilities they use tonight are Astral.
